newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-PacDun appoints Ralph deputy chair.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-PacDun appoints Ralph deputy chair.

text.p: Industrial conglomerate Pacific Dunlop Ltd said that John Ralph would be appointed deputy chairman.

"For some time the position of deputy chairman has been vacant. I am pleased to advise that John Ralph has accepted the board's invitation to assume this role from the annual general meeting in November," Pacific Dunlop John Gough said in a statement. Ralph has been a director since 1994.
